definition: PLA military personnel who specialize in literary or artistic pursuits

sentences.chinese: 乐谱亦已于2005年由香港基督教文艺出版社出版。

sentences.english: The Reception Study of Georg Lukács s Literature and Art Theory in China;
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义文艺理论是中国文艺理论的支柱和来源。

sentences.chinese: 马克思主义文艺理论是中国文艺理论的支柱和来源。

sentences.english: Cultural Studies provides an indispensable background for the reflection on literary theory as a discipline.
sentences.chinese: 文化研究是文艺学学科反思的重要学术背景。

sentences.english: The development of Balzac's literary ideology is a complicated course.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔扎克文艺思想的发展是一个错综复杂的过程。

sentences.english: He is now a researcher at Instiute For Arts & Literature Trend of People's University of China.
sentences.chinese: 现任中国人民大学文艺思潮研究所研究员。

sentences.english: The "looking back" literature and art is an objective social subsistent.
sentences.chinese: 后顾性文艺是社会的客观存在。

sentences.english: This congress reflects the unprecedented unity of writers and artists throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 这次大会，标志着全国文艺工作者的空前团结。

sentences.english: This is a literary and artistic work loved by the masses.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部为群众所喜闻乐见的文艺作品。

sentences.english: Of problem has arisen not only in literary and art circles but elsewhere as well.
sentences.chinese: 不仅文艺界，其他方面也有类似的问题。

sentences.english: Christopher Marlowe is one of the outstanding representatives of English Renaissance dramatists.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托弗马洛是文艺复兴时期英国戏剧的杰出代表。

sentences.english: His realism theory is an essential component of his entire outlook of literature and art.
sentences.chinese: 他的现实主义理论又是其整个文艺观的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: That Later Renaissance is a complicated historical term. W. J.
sentences.chinese: 后期文艺复兴是一个比较复杂的史学概念。

sentences.english: Literary criticism is an impetus of development of literary creation.
sentences.chinese: 文艺评论是文艺创作发展的推动力。

sentences.english: Literary criticism is an impetus of development of literary creation.
sentences.chinese: 文艺评论是文艺创作发展的推动力。

sentences.english: At first the artists of the Renaissance only had single-point perspective.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，文艺复兴时期的画家们只会运用单点透视。

definition: young person who adopts an artistic or intellectual style/abbr. for 文藝青年|文艺青年

style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character

to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
